title: Booniyom
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Thai, Buffet, Juice bar, Take-out
description: At the corner of Srinarong and Thepyothi, a vegetarian place offering a large buffet. There is also a store for food, hygiene products and herbal medicine. Owned by a cooperative which offers organically grown produce delivery.
streetAddress: corner of Thepyotee and Sreenarong Rd, Muang District
